name: ShooterBeat
description:
This projects was made for the Spring Jam 2020 made by UNREAL Engine

Is a Prototype for test 

Kill all the ennemies and be focus for get points you need listen the music and press the key correctly 

Blue [1] Green [2] Yellow [3] Red [4] Puple [5] 

i Used different stuff from the Market place 

Rythm Game Plugin

Ultimate Character 

Sinti Poligon Meshes ( PolygonFantasyRivals,PolygonScifi)

IceCool Material 

But all the game play was merge and modified by me also i made a new rig in Sinti Packs full compatible with Mannequin
